prompt: Will my house assignment affect the projects I am given?
completion: Potentially, yes. Your housemaster has discretion over assignments, but you can leave your house if you are in good standing.

prompt: Does which house I am in determine what projects I get assigned to?
completion: It is possible. Your housemaster has some say in the matter, but you have the option to switch houses if you are in good standing.

prompt: If I am in a certain house, will I be limited in the projects I can work on?
completion: There is a chance. Your housemaster has some control over assignments, but if you are in good standing you can choose to leave your house.

prompt: Can being in a specific house affect the types of projects I get?
completion: Yes. Your housemaster has some control over which projects are assigned to students in their house, though you can switch houses if you are in good standing.

prompt: Is it possible that my house affects the projects I am assigned to?
completion: Indeed it is. Your housemaster has some discretion, but you may leave your house in good standing and have more control over your project assignments.
